description:
Only submit HomePageIsNewTabPage metric when ShowHomeButton is enabled

This is a rebased version of https://chromiumcodereview.appspot.com/20722007 which was reverted due to a reverted branch dependency.

BUG=266902

Committed: https://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=215935

messages.text:
Has the original change made it to dev or beta (on any branch) at this point?

--mark

On 2013/08/05 20:09:24, Mark P wrote:
> Has the original change made it to dev or beta (on any branch) at this point?
> 
> --mark

The original change is in M29, yes.

On Mon, Aug 5, 2013 at 1:16 PM, <rockot@chromium.org> wrote:

> On 2013/08/05 20:09:24, Mark P wrote:
>
>> Has the original change made it to dev or beta (on any branch) at this
>> point?
>>
>
>  --mark
>>
>
> The original change is in M29, yes.
>

Then a good practice is to rename the histogram and mark the old one as
obsolete.  You don't want to mix bad data with good.

--mark


>
> https://codereview.chromium.**org/21690005/<https://codereview.chromium.org/21690005/>
>

> a good practice is to rename the histogram and mark the old one as
> obsolete.  You don't want to mix bad data with good.

Thanks. SGTM and done.

https://codereview.chromium.org/21690005/diff/10001/chrome/browser/prefs/pref_metrics_service.cc
File chrome/browser/prefs/pref_metrics_service.cc (right):

https://codereview.chromium.org/21690005/diff/10001/chrome/browser/prefs/pref_metrics_service.cc#newcode29
chrome/browser/prefs/pref_metrics_service.cc:29: UMA_HISTOGRAM_BOOLEAN("Settings.InUseHomePageIsNewTabPage",
This name is icky.  How about something clearer such as Settings.GivenShowHomeButton_HomePageIsNewTabPage?

https://codereview.chromium.org/21690005/diff/10001/tools/metrics/histograms/histograms.xml
File tools/metrics/histograms/histograms.xml (right):

https://codereview.chromium.org/21690005/diff/10001/tools/metrics/histograms/histograms.xml#newcode13110
tools/metrics/histograms/histograms.xml:13110: when a profile is loaded. This is only logged if the Home button is enabled.
^Home button is enabled^home button is shown

https://codereview.chromium.org/21690005/diff/10001/chrome/browser/prefs/pref_metrics_service.cc
File chrome/browser/prefs/pref_metrics_service.cc (right):

https://codereview.chromium.org/21690005/diff/10001/chrome/browser/prefs/pref_metrics_service.cc#newcode29
chrome/browser/prefs/pref_metrics_service.cc:29: UMA_HISTOGRAM_BOOLEAN("Settings.InUseHomePageIsNewTabPage",
On 2013/08/05 21:25:49, Mark P wrote:
> This name is icky.  How about something clearer such as
> Settings.GivenShowHomeButton_HomePageIsNewTabPage?

Done.

https://codereview.chromium.org/21690005/diff/10001/tools/metrics/histograms/histograms.xml
File tools/metrics/histograms/histograms.xml (right):

https://codereview.chromium.org/21690005/diff/10001/tools/metrics/histograms/histograms.xml#newcode13110
tools/metrics/histograms/histograms.xml:13110: when a profile is loaded. This is only logged if the Home button is enabled.
On 2013/08/05 21:25:49, Mark P wrote:
> ^Home button is enabled^home button is shown

Done.

minor nit that you missed before, other lgtm

https://codereview.chromium.org/21690005/diff/16001/tools/metrics/histograms/histograms.xml
File tools/metrics/histograms/histograms.xml (right):

https://codereview.chromium.org/21690005/diff/16001/tools/metrics/histograms/histograms.xml#newcode13101
tools/metrics/histograms/histograms.xml:13101: when a profile is loaded. This is only logged if the Home button is shown.
nit: lowercase Home please

On 2013/08/05 22:00:53, Mark P wrote:
> minor nit that you missed before, other lgtm
> 
> https://codereview.chromium.org/21690005/diff/16001/tools/metrics/histograms/histograms.xml
> File tools/metrics/histograms/histograms.xml (right):
> 
> https://codereview.chromium.org/21690005/diff/16001/tools/metrics/histograms/histograms.xml#newcode13101
> tools/metrics/histograms/histograms.xml:13101: when a profile is loaded. This is
> only logged if the Home button is shown.
> nit: lowercase Home please

Wasn't sure if that was intentional. In that case I've changed both occurrences in the relevant summaries.

CQ is trying da patch. Follow status at
https://chromium-status.appspot.com/cq/rockot@chromium.org/21690005/22001

subject: Only submit HomePageIsNewTabPage metric when ShowHomeButton is enabled
